about_the_game:
This is not the adventure to the wonderland.
Neither not the role playing as the superhero or protagonist on the viral television programs.
If you are looking something new, such as role playing as a creature even you are scary of, we are proudly introducing you a Cockroach Simulator!
The simulator game that letting you survive in the dirty house of huntsman as a cockroach.
Enjoy your cockroach life with a lovely fatty uncle in Cockroach Simulator household survivor today!!

unique features
- Simulating life as a tiny creature
- Enjoy finding food whether it's from your uncle's scraps. Or the food that is usually delivered to the door every minute.
- Haunting music atmosphere
- survival from the creatures within
- Difficulties become more difficult as time passes.

Some of the content or props may contain explicit images, sounds and objects that may suggest drugs, sex and violence. therefore may not be suitable for players of all ages[/b
Share your ideas for what you want to see or experience in this Cockroach Simulator.
As the developer we would like to incorporate players opinions and suggestions to make our game even more entraining.
So share your voice to improve this game with us!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7 or above
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 6
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cockroach Simulator household survivor Allows you to simulate being a cockroach that even you can't imagine. In its view, you too are a terrible thing.
